bundle-snappydata-template.title: SnappyData Bundle Template
bundle-snappydata-template.description: This bundle serves as a template for creating a new SnappyData onlne bundle.

bundle-snappydata-1-docker-debezium_kafk.title: Debezium-Kafka SnappyData/ComputeDB Connector
bundle-snappydata-1-docker-debezium_kafk.description: This bundle integrates SnappyData/ComputeDB with Debezium for ingesting initial data and CDC records from MySQL into a SnappyData/ComputeDB cluster via a Kafka sink connector included in the `padogrid` distribution. It supports inserts, updates and deletes.
